name: che-ical-mcp
description: Native EventKit integration for macOS Calendar and Reminders apps
long_description: A powerful MCP server providing 20 tools for managing macOS Calendar events and Reminders. Features include batch operations, conflict detection, duplicate finding, multi-keyword search, and support for iCloud, Google, and Exchange calendars. Requires macOS 13.0 or later.

tools.name: list_calendars
tools.description: List all available calendars and reminder lists

tools.name: create_calendar
tools.description: Create a new calendar or reminder list

tools.name: delete_calendar
tools.description: Delete a calendar by its identifier

tools.name: list_events
tools.description: List calendar events in a date range

tools.name: create_event
tools.description: Create a new calendar event with optional reminders

tools.name: update_event
tools.description: Update an existing calendar event

tools.name: delete_event
tools.description: Delete a calendar event

tools.name: list_reminders
tools.description: List reminders from the Reminders app

tools.name: create_reminder
tools.description: Create a new reminder with optional due date

tools.name: update_reminder
tools.description: Update an existing reminder

tools.name: complete_reminder
tools.description: Mark a reminder as completed or incomplete

tools.name: delete_reminder
tools.description: Delete a reminder

tools.name: search_events
tools.description: Search events by keyword(s) with AND/OR matching

tools.name: list_events_quick
tools.description: List events with quick time range shortcuts (today, tomorrow, this_week, etc.)

tools.name: create_events_batch
tools.description: Create multiple events at once

tools.name: check_conflicts
tools.description: Check for overlapping events in a time range

tools.name: copy_event
tools.description: Copy an event to another calendar (with optional move)

tools.name: move_events_batch
tools.description: Move multiple events to another calendar

tools.name: delete_events_batch
tools.description: Delete multiple events at once

tools.name: find_duplicate_events
tools.description: Find duplicate events across calendars
